rows.label: tlk01000905_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh, I see! This school wasn't always
a school from the start, was it!

rows.label: tlk01000905_msg0002
rows.name:
For the school, Rex-niichan and
everyone gathered the materials,
and Hummer-san repaired it...

rows.label: tlk01000905_msg0003
rows.name:
And it wouldn't have been possible
if you hadn't brought the teachers.

rows.label: tlk01000905_msg0101
rows.name:
Kyukyu-sensei starts experimenting
right away, and her experiments always
fail, so it's a little worrying...

rows.label: tlk01000905_msg0102
rows.name:
But I like having a Nopon
teacher, they're so cute!

rows.label: tlk01000905_msg0103
rows.name:
I get to pet her fluffy
fur during break time!
